column2: This character is a veteran of a Great War in the name of the Tzars.
This character is a veteran of a Great Patriotic War, having fought in the name of the Lord.
This character is a veteran of a Mirrazumudrost Great Holy War.
This character is a veteran of a Novelist Great Holy War.
This character rode into war to fight the enemies of the Great Khan.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War to protect the ancient tales from all enemies.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War for the glory of Tir Na NoG.
This character has participated in a Dharmic Great Holy War.
This character has participated in a People's Liberation War and has carved out their own realm out of the lands of the enemies of the Heavenly Jade Chairman.
This character is a veteran of a Winter War and has been made into a Knight of the Round Table.
This character has participated in a war in the name of Satanael to vanquish the servants of Yaldabaoth.
This character has participated in a Cycle's Calling, a holy war in the name of the great Thudnerbird.
This character has participated in a Great Moonfall, where in the name of the Moon, the enemies of the faith were punished.
This character has participated in a Sea War, fighting to preserve the supremacy of the three rulers of the sea.
This character has participated in a Grove Defense, fighting to preserve the holy groves of Sarna.
